title: Privacy-Preserving Semantic Communications via Multi-Task Learning and Adversarial Perturbations
summary: Semantic communications conveys task-relevant meaning rather than focusing solely on message reconstruction, improving bandwidth efficiency and robustness for next-generation wireless systems. However, learned semantic representations can still leak sensitive information to unintended receivers (eavesdroppers).
